thread.title: Futures rise on strong earnings from Netflix, health majors

title: Futures rise on strong earnings from Netflix, health majors
text:
April 17, 2018 / 11:49 AM / Updated 2 minutes ago Wall Street rallies as Netflix, UnitedHealth earnings shine Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stock indexes rallied on Tuesday on broad-based gains while Netflix and UnitedHealth earnings impressed investors and boosted optimism about the U.S. corporate reporting season. Traders work on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange in the borough of New York City, New York, U.S., April 17, 2018. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid 
The Dow Jones Industrial Average .DJI rose 213.59 points, or 0.87 percent, to 24,786.63, the S&P 500 .SPX gained 28.54 points, or 1.07 percent, to 2,706.38 and the Nasdaq Composite .IXIC added 124.81 points, or 1.74 percent, to 7,281.10. Reporting by Sinead Carew; Editing by Dan Grebler
